#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

ll ut[1000010];
ll r[1000010];

void calculate()
{
	for (ll i = 1; i <= 1000010; i++) {
		ut[i] = i;
	}

	for (ll i = 2; i <= 1000010; i++) {
		if (ut[i] == i) {
			for (ll j = 2 * i; j <= 1000010; j = j + i) {
				ut[j] -= ut[j] / i;
			}
		}
	}

	for (ll i = 2; i <= 1000010; i++) {
		if (ut[i] == i) {
			ut[i] = i - 1;
		}
	}

	for (ll i = 1; i <= 1000010; i++) {
		for (ll j = i; j <= 1000010; j += i) {
			r[j] += i * ut[i];
		}
	}
}

int main()
{
	calculate();

	ll n, t, sum;

	scanf("%lld", &t);

	while (t--) {
		scanf("%lld", &n);
		sum = (1 + r[n]) * n / 2;
		printf("%lld\n", sum);
	}

	return 0;
}
